website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty design for active, adventurous lifestyle.
pros: Durable grip, wheels, bearings, and trucks
Made to last long for intense boarders
Customers admire its coasting abilities and speed
cons: Heavy, can be noisy, not for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Bad bearings! We have many boards and a complete board should at least roll.
customer_reviews.text: Bad bearings! We have a skate boarding family, and usually purchase boards at local shops or from skate warehouse.com. My seven year old daughter loved the graphic on this board and had $50 from from Christmas. Figuring that a $54 complete board was probably better than something at walmart, but cheaper than just buying a deck and essentials from a skate shop, we went ahead with it... Mistake! I have added a video of the bad side of the board. The other side spun a little better, but not much. My girl is now bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Rolls nice a smoothly, and is solid quality. We haven't really tried it with anything physically challenging to see how the deck, trucks and wheels hold up, but from my limited usage of it it seems resilient and strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy different bearings
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6year daughter, so she stops using mommy's board. Switched out the wheels to the multicolored OJ wheels and the bearings to REDS. The bearings it came with were a joke, I even tried to oil them (so I could put the new ones in my board) but there was no helping them. The board itself is good and the trucks are a nice red color. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be a great skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this skateboard! I purchased it for my 8 year old daughter; I wanted something that was feminine, but not too girly since she's a tomboy. Neither my husband nor I have ever been skaters, so I can't comment in depth on the quality of it. But from my point of view it seems to have very good components and seems like it's a pretty quality skateboard for the price. It arrived undamaged, but did take awhile to get here. I ordered it Aug 30th and didn't receive it until Sept 10th, which was after her birthday. That was kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 8 year old's birthday and it was definitely the best gift she received
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the quality of this board for the price. Bought for my 8 year old's birthday and it was definitely the best gift she received.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wake

customer_reviews.title: Just for Riding
customer_reviews.text: It was ok at first just to ride around, but the grip tape started peeling up. The graphic design on the back completely peeled off. Trucks and wheels are ok, but the bearings do not spin. They go for about 10 seconds with no weight, but with more weight that is like 6 seconds. The deck was pretty sturdy. I recommend this for an 8 year old, and no advanced tricks.
customer_reviews.author: tonia h

customer_reviews.title: great board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neice and she loved it, shes been skatboarding for a couple of years and is getting pretty good, she does her rail slides, dropins, ollies, manuals ect and she says her board takes a beating and still rides as good as the day she got it, She would give this 5 stars, and beacuse it made her so happy I give it 5 stars, buy it now, you won"t regret it
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a skateboarder, besides playing around on one as kid. My daughter wanted a skateboard for Christmas so I went and did my research like I usually do and ended up deciding on this one. I am very happy with the purchase and this seems like a very sturdy and well built skateboard. As for being for a beginner, this one is a little difficult for a young beginner I would say, but I am beyond pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael leonbruno

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginners but I should have just bought a better complete skateboard up front. My daughter had lessons and the coach says they call these types of boards "decelerators". Ha. But I guess for the price it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Hales Clayton

customer_reviews.title: SLOW WHEELS
customer_reviews.text: Cute skateboard and great graphic, but the wheels are very slow. Also, would have been good if the butterfly graphic could have been on top and bottom. No one sees it when it's facing the earth.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Beginner ready
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a beginner boarder. I was very happy with the details of the picture. The wheels are a great brand and and the board it is very sturdy. Shipping was quick and she is ready to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Me and Mine

customer_reviews.title: Vivid Colors, Excellent Skateboard
customer_reviews.text: The young girl that received this as a gift loves it, the underside colors are vivid and beautiful, the truck and wheels are better than average and much better than what you'll find in big box stores. A perfect skateboard for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and quality board
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful, beautiful board. My 6 year old daughter wanted a skateboard but I wasn't trying to spend a fortune on an interest that may just be a passing fancy. This board is economical but is very sturdy, quality construction. I like that its girly without being too girly, she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Good board, attractive colors, rolls very smooth
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board, strong enough to handle some tricks. Trucks are strong and solid, wheel bearings are very smooth. Truck bolts can be slightly tight depending on rider weight, but can be quickly adjusted. Very good board for the price. Great for beginner to intermediate skaters.
customer_reviews.author: BluPenguin

customer_reviews.title: It’s an average quality board.
customer_reviews.text: Deck was okay wheels and bearings of Walmart quality. Really cool looking board.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter - as soon as the weather improves sure she will love it! She has used it in their garage some.
customer_reviews.author: traeand

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my niece for Christmas and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas and it was the hit of the presents for the year. She even took it to grandma's the next day and got the whole family trying it out, including the 65 yr old grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are horrible. They don’t move and the trucks are horrible as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael J LoTruglio

customer_reviews.title: Great for my young children.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are young and have wanted to learn to skateboard. This was perfect for what we needed. I'm don't know why technically makes a skateboard a great skateboard. But it arrived in good shape, the wheels turn and my kids have fun with it so it's got 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Adame

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She is 10 years old, and this is her first skateboard. I was kind of hesitant about buying it because of her safety, but it was easy for her to learn. I would recommend this to any parent looking for a skateboard for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is five. It's perfect and she loves it. The colors are brillant and beautiful. I was concerned when reading the reviews that It might be to big for her however it's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: llw

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but it's pulls to the side right out ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but it's pulls to the side right out of the box. My husband adjusted the trucks, but it hasn't fixed the problem
customer_reviews.author: K. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Rides well, but top layer is not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It rides well enough and my daughter likes it, but I've been a bit frustrated about how quickly and easily the black grit stuff has chipped and peeled off the top. It looks very beat up for how little it has been used.
customer_reviews.author: Crissi (Fraz Zled Momma to Many)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skateboard!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her skateboard! Colors are very bright and beautiful and so far seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: melissa h

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was happy to receive this skateboard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy to receive this skateboard. She has been wanting a skateboard after trying out her brothers. This is a good skateboard to learn on and ride around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: motorgod0

customer_reviews.title: I think the bearings might be fake because real abec 5 bearings should have ring holding the washer in which you can easily take
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to take out the bearings and apply speed cream to it but the shields won't come off. I have tried using a needle and it won't work. I think the bearings might be fake because real abec 5 bearings should have ring holding the washer in which you can easily take off in order to clean and lubricate the bearings for smoother rolling? Does anyone know how to take the shield off? might have to return this board
customer_reviews.author: skatergirl

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy enough that her sister
customer_reviews.text: Our eldest granddaughter loves the board. It's sturdy enough that her sister, younger by four years, will enjoy it too when she comes of age.
customer_reviews.author: Vermeer63

customer_reviews.title: Bearings are terrible. Made in china sticker almost impossible to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with loose nuts. Bearings are terrible. Made in china sticker almost impossible to remove without leaving sticky stuff on board. Otherwise it's an ok board for a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Salt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. The colors are very bright and she loves the butterflies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality - bearings and wheels are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year old daughter. Disappointed in the quality - bearings and wheels are terrible. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for beginner or intermediate skater
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a friends daughter and by far she felt this was her favorite gift. The graphics were bold and the board was well made. Arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bright skateboard.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this skateboard was better then pictured. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: cinda baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skate board for a larger girl. Nice to have a "girly" design.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really nice board. Works great, looks cool enough for a tomboy, yet has a girly design.
customer_reviews.author: donnazang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and my daughter loves to use it.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Holt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Omg what have I done! I have a skater child! It is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: this is a great skateboard. not the most expensive, but we don't need that. it works great in the road in front of our house.
customer_reviews.author: atxrelo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy for 10 year old, daughter chose this, very colorful and nice. All dark grey on top for traction.
customer_reviews.author: l_bon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Rose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wheels moved smoothly for our 8 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this skateboard. She is a beginner and it has inspired her friends to ride too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board for my daughter's 8th birthday in Nov 2017, and after less than 2 months of use, the deck is delaminating. This is not what I would expect after light use from a little girl. She practices ollies and rides around the skate park with it, so she's not beating it up. We hang up all of our boards in the garage, so it has not been exposed to water either. The trucks, bearings and wheels are just ok. The sticker on the bottom is a pain to try to get off, so we left some of it on. Maybe I got a lemon, but I would recommend investing in a better board.
customer_reviews.author: fountained

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I LOVED IT!!!! So did my mom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. from NC

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my 8yo niece. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshep jones

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter totally loves the skateboard. She is a novice and it seems to be a good quality and be working well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 yr old daughter and she loves it. She is taking skateboarding lessons and has fun doing tricks. The delivery was quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sapna S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and girly and great quality! My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KPG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect board for my 10 year old daughter who is just learning.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Karlson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skateboard for a pre-teen girl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 9 year old girl. Her very first skateboard, and she is thrilled. I was very happy with the purchase. The board is quite large and sturdy. The top is a textured surface for good foot grip, the wheels roll very smoothly, and the graphics on the bottom side of the board are vibrant and gorgeous. If you are in the market for a girly skateboard, I think you will be very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gimbert

customer_reviews.title: Punisher skateboard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old granddaughter for Christmas after reading reviews online. She loves it. Great graphics, quality skateboard. Not a "toy" skateboard, it's a good quality skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Valinda Nabonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this skateboard. It is a nice size, has good wheels, trucks, risers and the grip tape seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Wilds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skateboard all around! My 8 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: BCEagle3000

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skateboard for my 7 year old daughter who is such a sports fanatic. I wanted her to have a nice skateboard that was still "girly". This one is PERFECT! This is her first skateboard and so far she is loving it. The details and the colors on the skateboard are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifful

customer_reviews.title: Yes we loved it very much and we love the bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Yes we loved it very much and we love the bright colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff when turning so it' harder for younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Soba

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I saw it was so big, I will order from Amazon again, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: Simple board
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheap beginner board, this is it. The trucks are fine. The wheels and bearings are great to begin with. You will want to invest in some higher quality wheels/bearings down the road for tricks or street skating.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Great starter skateboard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only used it once so far. From what I can tell it seems sturdy and is a good ride. The wheels are fast, but not too fast for a beginner. I also love the design on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: B.Robin

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter was so excited when she opened the box. It's exactly what she wanted:) As soon as the snow melts we'll be able to try it!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great designs for that designer girl!
customer_reviews.text: Great board for a beginner! Bought for my 12 year old that loved it! Designs are way cool and not something you would find in a store!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted a skateboard. This one fit all of her wants and expectations. It's beautiful and girly as well!!
customer_reviews.author: KLGD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Skateboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great skateboard for a beginner. Looks to a a quality item with a good sturdy board and nice wheels. Larger than those little youth skateboards, so would be a good purchase for someone between the ages of 8-14. Purchased for my Angel Tree child and I know she will love it. I certainly would!
customer_reviews.author: Adeline

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: I really like this skateboard. I got the skateboard for my sister who is 30 years old! haha She just wanted something to try and have fun with. She is 65 inches tall and weighs about 155 and this board is fine for her. The wheels are pretty good and move smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Cas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I can't really rate this skateboard because it was bought as a Christmas present for my child but I thought it was a great price. She has been wanting a skateboard for quite sometime so I thought it would make a great present
customer_reviews.author: Sturner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great board for a great value and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie Holt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great skateboard quality in addition to beautiful graphic for girls! My daughter loves this and do does my husband who was a skater!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia grace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item was missing wheels and bearings when I received it
customer_reviews.author: Clayton D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. Fast shopping. Very pleased. Perfect for a beginner. My daughter loves it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stox

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: This is my 9 year old daughter's first skateboard. The size and colors are great. Nice to find something for a girl. The price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: We highly do not recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: We got a defective item!!!! And the worth thing is, we found out it when we started to explore a skateboard! So, actually, we can't to do a return of the skateboard because we ride it on a street, but at the same time we can't use it because it's with a defect. Our skateboard all the time does turn left!!!!! It doesn't go straight!!!!!!! We highly do not recommend this seller!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please do not buy anything from this seller!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lidiya Ilchuk

customer_reviews.title: The graphics on the bottom look just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and uses it every day. The graphics on the bottom look just like the picture. It has a good ride.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy 22

product_meta.title: Punisher Skateboards Butterfly Jive Complete 31-Inch Skateboard with Canadian Maple
product_meta.description:
31.5-Inch X 7.75-Inch 7-ply Canadian Maple double kick concave deck, PUNISHER Brand 5" Heavy-Duty alloy trucks, PUNISHER Brand ABEC-7 bearings, 54x36mm white PU cast wheels, PE Riser Pad w/PU Cushion. 80AB grip tape. Complies with HR4040 & EN13613 standard. Formaldehyde free wood. 100% Assembled, no assembly required. 30 Day manufacturer’s warranty against any defects in craftsmanship.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
31" x 7.5" Double Concave Deck featuring Canadian Maple construction. This board has the second best available bearings, the wheels are ideal for pavement or a skate park, and the reinforced trucks are strong enough for an adult rider. Ideal for any skateboard enthusiast. All Punisher Skateboards use world-class components from the finest manufactures in the world. Attention to detail is stressed on every board from lowest to highest priced included printed cushions with out company logo. Punisher Skateboards prides ourselves on function and form. In over three years we have not had one defective component or failure.
feature_bullets: Complete High Quality Double Kickboard Skateboard made from 31.5" x 7.75" 7-Ply Canadian Maple.
Mild Concave Skateboard Deck Profile for Superior Control While Riding, Turning, and Doing Tricks.
PUNISHER ABEC-7 High Speed Wheel Bearings. PE Riser Pads, and Polyurethane Cushions with Punisher Skateboard Logo Printing. PUNISHER Heavy-Duty 5" Alloy Trucks & Bases.
54x36mm PU Ivory White Wheels with Punisher Skateboard Graphics.
Full Color Graphics on one side and 80AB Heavy Duty Grip Tape on the other. No Assembly Required.
